major_updates.title: Comprehensive Support for DeepSeek R1
major_updates.description: Now fully integrated in both the Community and Cloud versions (.ai).

major_updates.title: Real-Time Chain of Thought Display
major_updates.description: Transparently presents the AI's reasoning process, making the resolution of complex issues clear and visible.

major_updates.title: Deep Thinking Experience
major_updates.description: Utilizing Chain of Thought technology, it provides more insightful AI conversations.

major_updates.title: Intuitive Problem Analysis
major_updates.description: Makes the analysis of complex issues clear and easy to understand.

steps: Upgrade to cyb3 v1.49.12 or visit .ai.
Select the DeepSeek R1 model in the settings.
Experience a whole new level of intelligent conversation!

feedback_and_support.message: If you encounter any issues while using the application or have suggestions for new features, feel free to engage with us through GitHub Discussions. Let's work together to create a better cyb3!
